page.title: 16The Churches of Nantwich
page.content: The Nantwich churches all play their individualistic role in the town's religious life.Geographically {St.Mary's Parish Church,}commands a central position.This beautiful Anglican building is full of historical interest.The Rector leads a dedicated team.Besides the varied services there is a Sunday school, a superb choir, Guiding and Scouting, and many adult groups.The Parochial Church Council provides overall direction especially in maintaining the building for posterity,but worship pastoral care and alms-giving are the Church's life blood. In 1974 the Congregational and Baptist congregations joined for united services of worship and formed the{United Reformed Church.}The 300 year old Baptist Church is having its present site in Market St. developed.
